website_summaries.verdict: Heat, bake, and grill all in the same appliance with this convection microwave.
pros: Features grill, convection, and microwave functions along with 9 presets
Easy to use, and comes with a removable grill rack to use with the grill mode
cons: The exterior heats up when using the convection setting, and it's very loud

website_summaries.verdict: Acts like a combo microwave, convection, and grill.
pros: This midsize microwave is packed with functions that give you flexibility when cooking
The convection technology allows even heating
The grilling function, which is more of a broil setting, even lets you toast bread, make grilled cheese, and brown other foods, such as bacon
cons: Users report that the door can be tight and hard to open

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient microwave
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for this microwave. Big and fast at heating all sorts of things. This oven also has a conventional heating component and came with a metal grill accessory. I haven’t placed it inside bc it’s metal. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Very good microwave and convection
customer_reviews.text: First off, our 2nd Kenmore (ugh) microwave/convection that we had for just two years made a loud bang and stopped. Our new Emerson arrived a week ahead of the scheduled date! I was thrilled because our regular oven doesn't heat up when it's really hot outside. Anyway, the only sort-of issue that I have with my new Emerson is that it only heats the convection oven up to 425 degrees. My Kenmores heated to 450 degrees. Oh well. Problem solved -- just leave the food in a little longer. I even bought some Emerson stock because I was so pleased. I hope my unit lasts!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: ... first "Microven" and I have to say this is cool, but read the manual it has a 50/50 ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my first "Microven" and I have to say this is cool, but read the manual it has a 50/50 setting were it cooks with BOTH Microwaves and the Oven fun light show.... but It cooks just fine with the oven part and the microwave part works well like a microwave. but the beeping holly hell I wish I could turn that off.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great and broiler unit on top is nice to have, great for browning items. Great investment and I would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: az43101

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and design. Did not like that it smells like burning plastic and the outside gets way too hot! It gets hot like the outside of a toaster.
customer_reviews.author: K. Preston

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is well built and easy to use too. Similar to my previous 8 year old Emerson microwave. Only complaint, the interior light is not as bright and front panel is not back-lighted for night time usage.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Warning This microwave almost killed me it turned on alone as I was sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Best microwave almost killed me it turned on alone by itself I was sleeping and the whole house is smoked up microwave is very dangerous and I contacted the maker it came from China so be careful I won't buy this microwave again I'm also scared to use any other microwave after the experience I had with this microwave warning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good, works but needs better manual
customer_reviews.text: overall so far it works great but would be better if it came with better reading material on how best to use the griller. there seems to be no mention on provided instructions about that function
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Flores

customer_reviews.title: It cooks food. But read the manual first.
customer_reviews.text: The specs said "11 Power levels" was really disappointed upon finding out it was 0-10. But grill function works well, I recommend finding a dollar store pizza pan to avoid a mess when using it. But pizza setting is combo microwave/grilling so metal pan is not usable with that function.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but only 6 wks. Add on You must PAY FOR FREIGHT TO FIX OR REPLACE DURING WARRANTY PERIOD SO READ FINE PRINT!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Clark

customer_reviews.title: Loud and poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: This had the loudest sound I’ve ever heard while it worked. We couldn’t even hear the radio when it was running. Needless to say we returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: klm

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: We were shocked to find that there was no microwave in the Condo unit we are renting. It is amazing the things you discover you used to use a microwave for. We didn't want to spend too much and I was all for a simple one. My husband, however, said he always wanted one that would grill so he picked this one out. I don't think he has used the grill feature. yet though. The thing I like about it is that the dishes are not as hot to touch as they usually are. I have yet to need oven mitts to remove dished cooked in it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: WOW, Love this microwave
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life. I use the Grill feature more than the microwave. It is fantastic! It does not heat up the kitchen like the oven and cooks food thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave so much that after 8 or9 years of use, I replaced it with the same one. The paint started wearing off inside this year. The microwave still was working well. It’s very fast cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Fast cook
customer_reviews.text: What a great item. Came with no extra packing to get in the way. As a result, you get lovely decorator dents and distressing on your new microwave. Size is wide enough to hold a dinner plate and tall enough for a chicken. There's a sticker on top that cautions the exterior gets hot. So be careful where you put it. As you can see from the picture, I sadly decided to return mine and not burn the house down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave didn’t even last 6 months. I did enjoy the grill feature. It was just a bit small. Bottom line I wasn’t planning to replace it in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: stanrm

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, I have had Emerson microwaves before and I ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, I have had Emerson microwaves before and I use the hell out of them each and everyday. Because I have a disabled son who I have to warm up his feeds six times a day seven days aweek,and that does not include all my and his nurse daily uses heating lunches reheating meals and so on. For the abuse I do it seems to out last any other microwaves I purchased before. It is not quiet like I would like , but does everything I need without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Keith Young

customer_reviews.title: ... to what we had in my home and a good one at that
customer_reviews.text: This was an up-grade to what we had in my home and a good one at that. We are so excited about the way we can set the time and the food comes out perfect and we do not have to keep putting the food back in.
customer_reviews.author: NORMA STITZ

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave, has some great features like the grill ...
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave, has some great features like the grill function. Also I like that it will automatically turn itself off and restart and reset itself if its overheating. I accidentally forgot to put water in one of those bottle sterilizers you put in microwave. It could have caused a fire or caused the plastic to melt but the microwave turned off. Its big enough to use with sterilizers.
customer_reviews.author: Hide R. Flores

customer_reviews.title: It's fine..
customer_reviews.text: It's fine...but it's loud. Should be quieter. And the grilling stuff on the inside top...that's gonna be a pain to clean...I'm very careful covering stuff. I didn't study this enough before I purchased it. I didn't realize it has grilling features. I highly doubt I'll ever use it. I just wanted an 1100 watt microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY TO USE GRILL FUNCTION
customer_reviews.text: THE MICROWAVE IS A GOOD MICROWAVE UNIT. NOTHING OUTSTANDING ON THAT FRONT. HOWEVER BECAUSE OF THE GRILL FUNCTION IT HAS POTENTIAL THAT IS REALLY HARD TO EXPLOIT. FOR EXAMPLE, TO USE THE GRILL FUNCTION IN COMBINATION WITH MICROWAVE (THIS WOULD BE GREAT TO COOK HAMBURGER TO COOK OUT FAT WHILE GRILLING EXTERIOR) HOWEVER YOU LITERALLY NEED A CERAMIC TYPE DISH TO USE FUNCTION-CAN NOT USE METAL OR PLASTIC DUE TO MICROWAVES/HEAT. NOT TO MENTION, HOW TO HANDLE JUICES. THIS UNIT SHOULD COME WITH AT LEAST ONE APPROPRIATE COOKING DISH. ALSO, IF YOU USE THE MICROWAVE A LOT THEN OCCASIONALLY USE GRILL FUNCTION YOU HAVE TO REMEMBER NOTHING CAN BE ON TOP MICROWAVE. A BIT ANNOYING.
customer_reviews.author: burning cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking with lots of good features
customer_reviews.text: Faster than my old microwave.Nice looking with lots of good features. Would be five stars except it is loud on micro function. Grill is silent and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: My family and i love this microwave. Our old one quit working on us and we didnt have alot of extra money to buy a new one. I found this one at a good price and figured id give it a shot and glad i did
customer_reviews.author: matt c

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave! Very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second microwave (EXACT ONE) and I really love this product. It's powerful and fast and exactly what our family needs. My only complaint on this one is that it makes a buzz noise while in operation. My last one didn't do that so I assume there was some sort of damage in transit which isn't the item's fault.
customer_reviews.author: April Eubanks (Pick Me!)

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! I did a lot of research and ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I did a lot of research and found this one. I love the microwave a lot! It is very quiet and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave! Although I have not tried the grilling and browning feature yet, I love the power and accuracy of settings
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Broke 9 months in
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. It worked great until sparks started flying in it 9 months after purchasing. Used it maybe 5 times a week and never put anything in it that you shouldn’t, such as tin foil. No reason for it to break in less than a year of ownership. Even though it’s under warranty, the cost of buying a box to ship it and the cost of shipping to the mfr and then back to you because you have to pay for shipping to them and then back to you...it’s just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Mannion

customer_reviews.title: Microwave Grill combo
customer_reviews.text: Takes long time to pre heat grill otherwise food doesn't cook well enough. Not as special as ad makes it sound.
customer_reviews.author: Deeone

customer_reviews.title: Well that worked!
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice to have it a little smaller but really not a big deal. With most food needing to be cooked in a 1100W Microwave I no longer need to guess how much cooking time using one with 1000W. Over all happy with how it is working.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Microwave/Convection combo excellent combo
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Black and stainless steel looks great. Received a day earlier than expected. The grilling and browning functions make this microwave extra special. There are instructions and recipes to help you learn to cook in an “oven” quicker than your regular oven.
customer_reviews.author: kim Shingola

customer_reviews.title: The basic operation is smooth and easy.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this. I haven't tried the grilling, yet, but will update after I do. The basic operation is smooth and easy. I looked for one that turned on the light when I open the door and not just while cooking. Nice size, fits under my corner cabinet perfectly with plenty of room in front of it to move food around. Push a number, you get that many minutes of cooking. Easy 30 second start one-touch warmup, too. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: MountainTime

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad... Not Bad At All
customer_reviews.text: Great buy at a great price point! Small, but mighty! So it's great for minimalist, dorm, camper, tiny house or apartment living. Ideal for the interior design preference of those not wanting to take up too much counter space or prefer a less cluttered look. Inside is deep in spite of the outside being shorter in length. I love the color and design as well. It's quite the jazzy lil' microwave!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShesArtDealerChic

customer_reviews.title: Super microwave
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave easy to use quiet haven’t used it as a grilled yet
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Not on Consumers Top of the List
customer_reviews.text: This Oven was a real surprise. As a microwave oven, it would do anything a microwave oven is supposed to do except ruin your food. Certain foods require regular ovens for the food to be edible once cooked. This oven woill work as a microwave oven for 90% cooki g and the overhead grill will perfect the final result.
customer_reviews.author: FlyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Griller function no so much . . .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because of the "griller" function. As described, I thought it would be good for tasks like making a quick piece of cheese toast, etc. (the grill function can be used independently or in conjunction with the microwave function). After a trial run with grilling, my food item ended up exactly as if i had microwaved it, with no browning at all. So for my needs, basically useless. Also, the instructions include basically zero information on the grill/microwave grill functions. And this thing is loud. I will be returning this item for a regular, smaller and more functional microwave.
customer_reviews.author: calamityjane23

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for over a year, now practically useless
customer_reviews.text: Used it for over a year. Started waking itself up spontaneously and displaying the U:00 and stopping after 30 seconds. Now it won't stop. I kept it, on a wifi switch(with cutoff timer), because it still heated up food. Today - in September 2020 - Purchased February 2019, it won't disable the U:00 Mode and won't heat up food. If you want to spin food (or other small items) and blow room temperature air on it while having it lit up by a small light bulb, I have the perfect device for you real cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jabaay

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but operation is confusing
customer_reviews.text: Complicated operational choices have been a challenge for my girlfriend and yet to be mastered. The 7, 8 & 9 buttons do not work and it might be the beginning choice she must make to activate them. I don't live nearby so I'm still hoping she can figure out this not-so-simple microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Sedonamichael

customer_reviews.title: Very good microwave. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hated to have to get new microwave. Didn't have time to do any research but we are very happy with our purchase. Heats as good as our old 1200w much bigger unit. This is the perfect size and we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B. Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for about a month now. It’s working great. My teen kids don’t have any trouble reading the buttons and using it. They love the popcorn button. It makes the popcorn perfect. The size it about right for most anything you would put in it. So far no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Aycock

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Completely stopped working out of nowhere. No power to it. Have no idea how to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: Terri w.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted until warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit in April of last year (2017) and have used it on a regular basis until today. The unit has stopped heating completely. Worked fine two days ago when it was last used.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Oven does cook well. Downsides - Oven is too light. Moves on a whim. Necessary to hold the thing down while pushing buttons. Very noisy oven (because the metal is too thin and lacking noise insulation). Have had the oven a few months. We'll see how it does long term.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Its great! The price is fantastic for the quality! You never know how much you need a microwave until your old one breaks! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorel Butler

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Within a week it was malfunctioning. Would shut off. Would make weird noises. Shipped it back.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great deal and came with a grill top inside -
customer_reviews.author: Mountaintoprider

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great works great I'm so glad I got this. It works great and I live the features.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Vandalsem

customer_reviews.title: easy to use works great
customer_reviews.text: so far so good I have a Emeril air fryer that is too load . I did Brats lasted night and they came out tasting good plus this microwave is not loud it dose get hot on top but that is no deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: alan hull

customer_reviews.title: I no longer am an Amazon customer because of UPS
customer_reviews.text: Sloppy. Persists in delivering to my toolshed, not my house (it is 20 yards, past some trees). I am extremely ill, so schlepping up a steep hill and wrestling 80 lbs of product down to my actual home is dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Erin Elizabeth Wright

customer_reviews.title: Why it is making those noises and the pictures show you can put a whole chicken but there
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to work with but make too much noise. I don’t like it. Always make me feel like and old microwave and will burst anytime . What are my options to return it. The space that show you can put a whole chicken is not enough may be a leg piece or breast piece only can be put. Haven’t tried that yet. Just used it as microwave and the noice is too Un bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Bali S

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love every future about this microwave. Easy for my children to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave! I especially like the high power, which cooks/reheats better and faster. I haven't used the grill, yet. Overall, I'm very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: Grill feature works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters first apartment. She has a new baby and needs things that are fast and that work well. The grill feature is amazing no more microwave taste. You all k is what I mean. It's nice and crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Isaac

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The clear plastic over the buttons, On the start button only the clear plastic has peeled away. I haven't had this product for very long and it bothers me that it should be worn in already.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my kitchen counter
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous microwave. Looks great on my kitchen counter. Easy to use and gets good results. I use the microwave frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Joan White

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: The product shuts off if it runs longer then 10 minutes. The inside spinner rumbles and make a lot of noise. I called for assistance because it shut off and i was told if it does it again to call back. Well it happened after the warranty went off. It over heats and shuts off. it does it to often. I haven’t used all the features like the oven, but if i did the product probably would just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Manethsha

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best microwave I have ever owned. It defrost really good. I haven’t tried the baking feature yet. The performance of the features are great so far. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Barnett

customer_reviews.title: FIRE
customer_reviews.text: Was a nice unit but a year later it caught on fire. No more electronic items for us from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Stone

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and convection and grill
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, in 3 legs, the box is bent from transportation, but works. All 3 works: microwave, convection and grill. Very Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Chiriac

customer_reviews.title: Good Microwave
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Works great for the microwave. Not sure how to use the grill portion of it and there are no instructions on how to use it or any suggestions for it that come with the microwave. I've found some references by searching online from other consumers but no detailed info.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Best purchase I’ve made for my apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave! Specifically the combo function. The ability to crisp and warm something at the same time has genuinely been so wonderful. No more soggy fries or chewy pizzas. I literally recommend this to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I was just told it didn't work . I went to my moms house to see for myself. It turns on but doesn't heat up!!!!! going to try to return or exchange and I am hoping to get good customer service .
customer_reviews.author: Dazzle

customer_reviews.title: Cool Microwave
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is the perfect size and I especially love the grill. It is different from any other microwave. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Odd noise, lacks features
customer_reviews.text: Could be better but as long as it keeps working it's good for price. Can't give more stars due to noise
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking my new Microwave! My built in one stopped working so I had to get something to warm my coffee in! Lol It actually works better than the built in one. I highly recommend this microwave!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Papp

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Grill function isnt the best but it functions notably different (and better for some applications) than a conventional microwave. Has held up well for most of a year, even if the controls are a bit complex. Will update if and when I run into issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Very very heavy very very loud did a decent job but to heat something up for 30 seconds not really that great was going to return it but couldn’t lift it to be able to do so
customer_reviews.author: Christine K.

customer_reviews.title: Not working already
customer_reviews.text: This microwave gave out this weekend, i only had it a little over a year..what a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Larrie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size, not too big and not too small. Heats up quickly and effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all-round microwave oven.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. just as promised. Easy to use. A minor suggestion: After completion of a cooking cycle, the clock should not return to normal. Instead, it should flash to alert me that the heated food is still inside the oven. The clock should return to normal only after the heated food is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This was my only way to cook for six weeks during flood repair of my kitchen. We were able to have normal meals without going out every time. I wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Anita  B Weintraub

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but noisy. Nice user manual (but it reads like stereo instructions).
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Dalley

customer_reviews.title: Solid microwave for the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely old school in appearance, which attracted me. Broiler feature is nice to have although I haven't used it in this unit to date so can't comment. It's a bit load compared to a fancier, more expensive modern unit but does a nice job and is a great value for the price. Bought for our second home and am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Alexander

customer_reviews.title: power button stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The power button stopped working. I think it is stuck on low power. 2 pieces of bacon -60 seconds, still not cooked. Obviously I can't recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Thebookscout

customer_reviews.title: love it, compare to my old one it heats ...
customer_reviews.text: love it, compare to my old one it heats food up in no time haven't had the chance to try out the other options on it yes
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice microwave but mine came dented in multiple spots, underneath near the leg so it doesn't sit level and a few around the body one of which makes the door sit low and wobbly
customer_reviews.author: Zac H

customer_reviews.title: great microwave
customer_reviews.text: was alittle heavy to get out of box, but once you start using it its great, you can do a lot with it, its easy to use and great style, worth the money
customer_reviews.author: venie

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: Pops popcorn ....high watts in small package to fit in counter space - haven’t used broiler cooking part
customer_reviews.author: Lexi C

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave for the bucks
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Emerson microwaves and this is wonderful. Cooks fast reheats are a breeze and the grilling is also great does not smoke at all while grilling . This would make someone a great Xmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have used this microwave quite a bit now and it works well. I would recommend this to friends. The only con is they don't supply enough information about the grill function and how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Best microwave ever.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is my first time owning a brand new microwave and I'm super impressed. The food tastes cooked! It's such a great microwave. I love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Larger than my microwave that was in my Motorhome. Fits perfect and is a better microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice microwave for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice microwave for the price, it has a lot of nice features, the only downside it doesn't have a 30 sec. extend button, but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: It broke after four months of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It died after 4 months of purchase! I'm glad I bought the extended warranty. This purchase was a giant waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cats are the best!

customer_reviews.title: Microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in good condition. Upacked and pluged in. Works as promised. would recommend, A good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Kaehler

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far, we love the new microwave. We haven’t tried the grilling feature yet, but are looking forward to doing so. Everything works great, love the size and the look!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Working great for us!!! Have not tried the griller feature. Seems like it would splatter all over the oven... ???
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this Microwave .fit in the space of my old one, easy to see numbers ,very fast cooking
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Microwave 🤷🤷 with no grill
customer_reviews.text: Great price for large microwave the grill feature is subpar. I actually brought this micowave for this feature kinda disappointed but overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warranty. It’s cheap
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. There were a lot of bad reviews on this microwave so I bought the extended warranty for $14.99. My 86 year old mom used it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTA

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has the grille option and comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has the grille option and comes with the pizza rack. Works great, very sleek design and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, I bought it as a Christmas gift for my parents because their old Emerson was over 30 years old! How amazing is that!
customer_reviews.author: Ramo406

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for medium to large space. Counter or on sturdy cart. Cooks very well. Not a lightweight microwave.
customer_reviews.author: LanDio777

customer_reviews.title: The problem is being handled.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas prresent. The turntable broke after a week, making very load noises. Cannot get ahold of Emerson service.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave. I haven't used it as an oven as of yet but the microwave is very powerful and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s awesome, get a microwave cover for your plate!
customer_reviews.author: Ange'l B. Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Heats food quickly, quicker than my last microwave, not very loud and looks sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: GOOD EATS Y'ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son Loves it!!! A grill on the inside on cold winter nights! Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Not to big and bulky, the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Works like a regular 1100 Watt oven, but has the advantage of the grill option. When using grill mode, it takes longer to heat up. I am looking for instructions and recipes for grill mode.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix AmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable oven
customer_reviews.text: Remarkable oven and a great price. Replaced another Emerson, but didn't buy because of the brand. I'd buy this oven again.
customer_reviews.author: rrr

product_meta.title: Emerson 1.2 CU. FT. 1100W Griller Microwave Oven with Touch Control, Stainless Steel, MWG9115SB
product_meta.description: Color:Black & Stainless Steel| Size:1.2Cook and reheat your favorite meals with this Emerson 1100W Microwave. Featuring a convenient grill function it prepares your food in more ways than one. Nine pre-programmed recipe settings and a removable glass turntable allow you to achieve complete, even cooking. This Emerson black microwave features 11 power levels, two combo power levels and a time and weight defrost option for culinary convenience. An easy-to-read LED display with digital clock and a 99-minute, 99-second digital timer allow you to easily keep track of cook times, and an end-of-cooking signal lets you know when your food is done. Designed with safety in mind, the Emerson microwave with grill comes equipped with a child-safe lock to keep little hands out of harm's way. Sturdy and subtly-designed, this unit's brushed metal front and black cabinet are designed to add function and style to any kitchen decor.Make all of your favorites, from frozen pizza and popcorn to chicken, beef and veggies, in this versatile appliance. The Emerson 1100W Microwave allows you to cook the way you want when you want.
feature_bullets: 1.2 cu ft of cooking space Metal front and black cabinet
11 microwave power levels 1 pure grill power level
99-minute, 99-second digital timer Time and weight defrost LED display with digital clock
9 pre-programmed recipes: Popcorn Potato Frozen pizza Frozen vegetable Beverage Dinner plate Meat/chicken Meat/beef Meat/pork
